A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wanted desperately to love this movie. Perhaps it was saddled with a bad premise established in the TFA. The dynamic between the First Order and the resistance has never made sense. This movie had huge plot holes. The fight choreography was terrible. Kylo Ren is not menacing in the least. Instead\, he comes across as a petulant\, spoiled brat. Rey was better but still fell short of making me care about her character/want to root for her. Finn character continues to be a bit useless and a waste of Boyega. Finally\, I agree with Hamill that This is not the story arc that made sense for Luke Skywalker. His character deserved better. Rian Johnson ruined Luke for me.
